comments.body: Please update to `BSD 3-clause` in the feedstock so that the version of BSD is clear. Also please re-render after making that change to update the feedstock's README.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +36,40 @@about:
  home: http://github.com/astropy/astropy-healpix
  license: BSD
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE.md
